about_the_game:
In an unknown facility you are trapped in this platform shooter game. That are doing illegal tests on you. Things go awry when the head of the facility began creating creatures and releasing them on the scientists and test subjects. The attacks grew in number until the facility was overrun. Now you must fight your way out to gain your freedom before the creatures kill you as well. Do you have the will power and the strength to save the world from the unknown?

Features

24 Weapons of your choice!

Which includes a wide range of weaponry to hand guns to heavy weapons. 20 weapons have 3 attachments some of which are unique to specific gun. All these weapons have custom reloads some are really complex do to the design of the weapon. Most of these guns are real world but with my design. Some of them are custom made by me and are unique to this game. All of this is customizable is done in your loadout in the story at the beginning of chapters. Note: there's a chance that DLC weapons might be added in the future!

Story Mode!

story mode is full of ups and downs with 14 chapters in total. Here's what you could possible see include breaking platforms, moving platforms and traps. 3 different enemy types at this current moment. Might be more as the game develops. This is all going to be at launch With possible more to come in the future!

Enemy Types
    Scorchers This ground monster burns anything in its path with breathing fire.
    Gassy This flying monster has an upset belly and when he sees you, he will chase you to no end till he gets close enough to you he explodes this green gas.
    Dare Devils This flying monster when he sees you, he will chase you to no end till he gets close enough to you he explodes.

3 Survival Maps!

Three survival maps that are endless amounts of waves and endless amounts of enemies with a lot of cool features like a 3d printer which basically randomizes the choice of weapon and prints it for you to use and new weapons and more to come later as a future update!. Do you have what it takes to survive!

Weapon Showcase

This is where you can view all the weapons in game and look at the description of the gun.

Steam Stats

Show off your stats to your friends! where it tracks your level, prestige and all your kills separated by there type!

Steam Achievements

There is steam achievements at the current time and development frame there is 7 achievements but there will be more!

Lighting System

This setup makes the whole game more enjoyable to play. Where it can be light in one section and dark in another. At some points the lights can spawn monsters from it you have been warned. These lights can also be destroyed as well.

Blood System

This is a new feature I recently developed. If Blood Keep is on in the settings under graphics it will keep the blood on screen so if you want to paint the level red you can! otherwise with it turned off it will slowly fade out after each hit to a player or enemy.

content_descriptors.notes: If keep blood is on. Blood stays on screen so if you don't like that it can be disable it and by default that is turned off to where after each hit, it will slowly disappear.

Things go awry when the head of the facility began creating creatures and releasing them on the scientists and test subjects. The attacks grew in number until the facility was overrun. name: Quietus Allurement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, WIndows 11
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: File Size will change! when closer to release to account for the correct storage used

short_description: Follows a captured man trapped in a facility that is doing illegal tests on him. Things go awry when the head of the facility began creating creatures and releasing them on the scientists and test subjects. The facility was overrun. Now he must fight his way out to gain his freedom
